grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 摂護腺【セツゴセン】prostate gland
包摂【ホウセツ】subsumption, connotation, inclusion, encompassing
兼摂【ケンセツ】serving concurrently as, holding the additional post of
接心【セッシン】concentration, period of intensive zazen
kun reading compounds: 摂る【とる】to have (e.g. lunch), to take (e.g. vitamins)
